ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby and interupting casting.
ygData.msgSnippet: Darrian thanks for the insightful observations on lullaby..as always my friend you help this bards song sound sweeter..and be more effective! For those that
ygData.messageBody:
Darrian thanks for the insightful observations on lullaby..as always my
friend you help this bards song sound sweeter..and be more effective! For
those that don't know him Darrian has recently gained knowledge of the mana
song..he is happily making "pets" of mages and clerics..shamans and
druids..somewhere on Innoruuk!

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 35th chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server
